item.title: Robert Diab
item.description: I am a professor in the Faculty of Law at Thompson Rivers University in Kamloops, British Columbia. I write about law and technology, human rights, and civil liberties. My summaries of criminal law can be found here. Find me on Twitter @robertdiab, or email me at rdiab [at] tru.ca Recent writing “Should We Be Forced to See More Canadian Content on TikTok and YouTube?” The Conversation (June 2021) “The Great Unread: On William Deresiewicz’s ‘The Death of the Artist’”
